Story of Seasons:
Trio of Towns: Update
description:
An update for Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns is now available from Nintendo eShop.
All customers who own a copy of Seasons: Trio of Towns should download the update. This will update the software to Version 1.1 with the following amendments:

- Various bug fixes.

â€¢ Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
